#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long
#define ull unsigned long long
#define pi pair<int,int>
#define pl pair<long long,long long>
#define pb push_back
#define eps 1e-12
using namespace std;
inline vector<int> zarray(string s)
{
	int n=s.size();
	vector<int> z(n);
	int l=0,r=0;
	for(int i=1;i<n;i++)
	{
		if(i<=r)
		{
			z[i]=min(z[i-l],r-i+1);
		}
		while(i+z[i]<n&&s[z[i]]==s[i+z[i]])
		{
			z[i]++;
		}
		if(i+z[i]-1>r)
		{
			l=i,r=i+z[i]-1;
		}
	}
	return z;
}
int a[1000009];
int main()
{
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	int n;
	cin>>n;
	string s;
	cin>>s;
	int k;
	cin>>k;
	vector<int> z=zarray(s);
	a[0]++;
	for(int i=1;i<n;i++)
	{
		a[0]++;
		a[z[i]]--;
	}
	for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
	{
		a[i]=a[i]+a[i-1];
	}
	for(int i=n-1;i>=0;i--)
	{
		if(a[i]>=k)
		{
			cout<<i+1<<"\n"<<s.substr(0,i+1)<<"\n";
			return 0;
		}
	}
	cout<<"0\n";
}
